REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2073 reute r f BC-<GRAND-UNION-CO>-SEES 06-01 0051

TEXT.TITLE: <GRAND UNION CO> SEES HIGHER YEAR SPENDING
TEXT.BODY: Grand Union Co, a subsidiary of Generale Occidentale SA of France, said it plans capital spending of 111 mln dlrs this year mostly for new stores and expansions of existing units, up from 76 mln dlrs for the year ended March 28, 1987. Reuter
